subject: Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The American teenager Mikaela Shiffrin cemented her status as the best slalom skier in the women’s World Cup on Tuesday, winning in Flachau, Austria.
snippet: The American teenager Mikaela Shiffrin cemented her status as the best slalom skier in the women’s World Cup on Tuesday, winning in Flachau, Austria.
